channel.title: Call to anyone who played and enjoyed Lost Odyssey!
channel.description:
I need your help!
After taking a year long hiatus from the game (senior years was a bitch), I decided to return, only to find I forgot most of what happened from disk one to disk 1 to the beginning of disk 4, where I am now.
Now, I know that Gongora is busy plotting and playing Tolten like a card to gain control of Uhra. I also know that he's using Grand Staff for...something. He took everyone's memories, and killed Lirum. Also the immortals are from a different world and are immortal because of that, and it has to with the hall of mirrors.
But I'm a bit confused. Are there any motives I missed that we learned about within the 1-3 disk span? Like why Gongora attacked Gohtza. And why he needs Grand Staff.
